channel.title: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server <--- WTF
channel.description:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server
What does this error mean!!!! I have been looking for the soultion over the whole forum I don't understand why I am getting this because this is cheesing me off.
I have the latest Java updates and evreything... I am really cheesed at the error I cannot run clients unless there in a .jar and some servers I cannot even boot. I think it has something to do with my windows variables I think... I donno but please I need help. :P

item.title: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server <--- WTF
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

This also be caused by Java not being recognized on your computer. Click here for a tutorial on getting java recognized on your computer.

Read full topic
